// This component will simply add utility functions to your developer console.
import{useSubstrate}from'../';export default function DeveloperConsole(props){var _useSubstrate=useSubstrate(),api=_useSubstrate.api,apiState=_useSubstrate.apiState,keyring=_useSubstrate.keyring,keyringState=_useSubstrate.keyringState;if(apiState==='READY'){window.api=api;}if(keyringState==='READY'){window.keyring=keyring;}window.util=require('@polkadot/util');window.utilCrypto=require('@polkadot/util-crypto');return null;}
